About Us

We are IT-change partners enabling digital transformation for Large enterprise & Captive IT units.

About Us

Today's market needs software driven businesses to respond for change & disruption by redefining the way they design, build & use software. We can accelerate your IT strategy to differentiate & succeed.

What we do?

We help companies to pivot and meet perpetual change with sustainable innovation, leveraging technology enabled transformation practices thereby delivering value, agility & flexibility.

We consult, design & build digital presence for your businesses by reducing system complexity & delivering relevance.

We # on, DevOps, DataOps, DataScience, UX/UI & Enterprise Mobility

We champion the adoption of sustainable (Enterprise Grade) & disruptive technologies (Social-Mobile-Analytics-Cloud) to Captive IT units, Startups & Enterprise.

Think of a workforce that extends beyond your employees, competing to solve some of the problems your organizations struggle with.

Voice

We love companies that love customers!

Be a customer driven organization, explore how digital technologies can help you.

Model

Our Model for application development eco-system is run by lean principles, flow thinking & DevOps.

We help expand your IT functions to win, serve & retain customers by delivering value.

We help you tap into vast pool of problem solvers across the spectrum.

Who is Hashworks?

We are a bunch of Enterprise nerds with a start-up DNA. Hashworks is a tech-startup run by Veteran minds based out of Bangalore, India.

Our Value

We share your dream, we share your purpose, behold customer centricity in everything we do.

When you are with Hashworks, we become a team, we IT-enable your business needs!
